title: RHOP Pamper Party + Murray Bartlett (HBO's The White Lotus)
itunes:title: RHOP Pamper Party + Murray Bartlett (HBO's The White Lotus)
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Potomac, which featured a pole discussion, Ashley's pamper party, and Wendy having time (#TickTock). After the recap, Danny sits down with Murray Bartlett, one of the stars of HBO's The Whi...
description:
Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Potomac, which featured a pole discussion, Ashley's pamper party, and Wendy having time (#TickTock). After the recap, Danny sits down with Murray Bartlett, one of the stars of HBO's The White Lotus to talk about filming the series in Hawaii, his season 4 episode of Sex and the City, a Looking reboot, and more!


Murray Bartlett Interview: 37:15ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
